description: An application submitted under Section 96a of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a non-material amendment in connection with the planning permission (DC/18/106467) dated 28 March 2019, in order to allow:- internal alterations to be approved to improve the means of escape by relocating the secondary escape staircase away from the main stair core;secondary windows to the corresponding bedrooms across the corridor have been removed and replaced by bricked up 'window tax' windows; replacement of the stone header details with a stacked brick bonding, changing the stone banding to soldier course brickwork;changing the top parapet material from stone to aluminium capping. Brick is the most common building material in the area, including its use as header details above windows and forming other decorative features on buildings;ground floor windows being raised 150mm above ground level;reconfiguration of the bin store to the rear;at 1 Waldram Park Road SE23.
